alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 3:36PM EST until February 04 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Eastern Catskills, mid-Hudson Valley, central and southern Taconics, southern Berkshires and northwestern Connecticut. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will transition to sleet and snow from northwest to southeast before tapering off this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
